item.title: 澳大利亚澳新银行称第一季度减值资产增加
item.description: 澳大利亚第四大贷款机构澳新银行集团（ANZ Group）周四表示，抵押贷款重组的增加导致第一季度资产减值跃升至2021年以来的最高水平。【原文：ANZ Group , Australia's fourth-biggest lender, said on Thursday that a rise in mortgage restructuring contributed to a jump in asset impairments to their highest levels since 2021 in the first quarter.】

item.title: CF 工业公司第四季度利润增长，原因是合成氨销量增加
item.description: 化肥公司 CF Industries 周三公布，由于合成氨销量增加和价格稳定，其第四季度利润增长了近 20%。【原文：Fertilizer firm CF Industries reported a nearly 20% rise in its fourth-quarter profit on Wednesday, helped by higher ammonia sales and steady prices.】

item.title: 美联储杰斐逊表示，美联储可以在下一次利率决策上慢慢来
item.description: 美联储副主席菲利普-杰斐逊（Philip Jefferson）周三表示，美国央行有时间权衡其下一步货币政策举措，理由是经济强劲且通胀率仍高于目标。【原文：Federal Reserve Vice Chairman Philip Jefferson said on Wednesday the U.S. central bank has time to weigh its next monetary policy move, citing a robust economy and still above target inflation.】

item.title: 澳大利亚福特斯库公司上半年利润下滑
item.description: 由于铁矿石价格持续疲软，澳大利亚 Fortescue 公司周四公布的上半年利润下降了 53%。【原文：Australia's Fortescue reported a 53% drop in first-half profit on Thursday as iron ore prices remained weak.】

item.title: 贷款机构巴西银行预计 2025 年调整后利润在 65 亿至 72 亿美元之间
item.description: 巴西国营银行巴西银行（Banco do Brasil）周三表示，预计今年调整后的净利润将在 370 亿雷亚尔（约合 65 亿美元）至 410 亿雷亚尔（约合 72 亿美元）之间，而伦敦证券交易所集团（LSEG）民意调查的分析师预计为 392 亿雷亚尔。【原文：Brazilian state-run lender Banco do Brasil expects its adjusted net profit this year to be between 37 billion reais ($6.5 billion) and 41 billion reais ($7.2 billion), it said on Wednesday, while analysts in a LSEG poll estimated 39.2 billion reais.】

item.title: 早间竞标：中国设定利率，贸易战担忧消散？
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 美国高级军事领导人访问巴拿马，讨论安全和运河问题
item.description: 美国驻中美洲国家大使馆周三表示，一名负责监管拉丁美洲大部分地区行动的美军高级指挥官将于本周访问巴拿马，讨论安全合作以及巴拿马运河和移民问题。【原文：A senior U.S. military commander who oversees operations over much of Latin America will visit Panama this week to discuss security cooperation as well as the Panama Canal and migration, the U.S. embassy in the Central American nation said on Wednesday.】

item.title: UnitedHealth 称医院失误导致 Ackman 批评保险公司
item.description: 联合健康集团（UnitedHealth Group）称，医院在电话中的失误导致一名外科医生被从手术室拉出来，为一名住院病人辩护，此举最终遭到亿万富翁比尔-阿克曼（Bill Ackman）的批评。【原文：UnitedHealth Group said a mistake at the hospital was behind the phone call that led to a surgeon being pulled from the operating room to defend a patient's inpatient stay, a move that was eventually criticized by billionaire Bill Ackman.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，Forever 21 计划在第二次破产中关闭近 200 家门店
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周三援引知情人士的话报道，作为预计最快将于下月启动的破产程序的一部分，总部位于美国的 Forever 21 运营商正准备再关闭至少 200 家分店。【原文：The U.S.-based operator of Forever 21 was preparing to close at least 200 more locations as part of a bankruptcy process expected to kick off as soon as next month, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday, citing people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 电信公司澳洲电讯上半年利润增长，宣布回购 4.76 亿美元
item.description: 澳大利亚电信公司（Telstra）周四公布的半年报显示，由于各业务部门表现强劲，这家澳大利亚最大的电信公司的利润增长了 6.5%。【原文：Australia's Telstra reported a 6.5% rise in its half-year profit on Thursday, as the country's top telecom company benefited from strong performance across its segments.】

item.title: 美国上周原油库存可能增加，产品库存下降
item.description: 路透社周三进行的一项扩大调查显示，预计上周美国原油库存将增加，而馏分油库存可能下降，汽油库存略有下降。【原文：U.S. crude oil stockpiles were expected to have risen last week, while distillate inventories likely fell with gasoline falling marginally, an extended Reuters poll showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 新西兰航空公司半年利润下降近 18
item.description: 新西兰航空公司（Air New Zealand）周四报告称，由于继续面临全球维修延误造成的飞机可用性问题，其半年利润下降了 17.8%。【原文：Air New Zealand reported a 17.8% drop in its half-yearly profit on Thursday as it continues to face aircraft availability issues caused by global maintenance delays.】

item.title: 美联储官员上月考虑放缓或暂停缩减债券规模
item.description: 美国财政部在未来几个月将如何管理债务发行的不确定性，促使一些美联储官员在上次政策会议上考虑放缓或暂停正在进行的资产负债表缩减，直到情况更加明朗。【原文：Uncertainty over how the U.S. Treasury will manage debt issuance over the next few months drove some Federal Reserve officials to contemplate at their last policy meeting slowing or pausing the ongoing drawdown of their balance sheet until greater clarity arrives.】

item.title: 国际财团赢得价值 39 亿加元的加拿大高速列车合同
item.description: 渥太华周三表示，一个包括加拿大航空公司、阿特金斯-雷利斯集团（AtkinsRealis Group）和法国国营铁路公司（SNCF.UL）在内的国际财团赢得了一份价值 39 亿加元、为期六年的合同，以帮助在加拿大东部开发高速客运铁路网。【原文：An international consortium including Air Canada , AtkinsRealis Group and France's SNCF (SNCF.UL) has won a C$3.9 billion six-year contract to help develop a high-speed passenger rail network in eastern Canada, Ottawa said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 亚马逊明年将停止对通信服务 Chime 的支持
item.description: 亚马逊表示，明年将停止对其统一通信服务 Chime 的支持，并从本周三开始不再接受新客户。【原文：Amazon said it would stop support for its unified communications service, Chime, next year and will not accept new customers beginning Wednesday.】

item.title: 欧盟贸易负责人准备与特朗普讨论贸易协议和降低关税问题
item.description: 欧盟高级贸易官员周三表示，欧盟有兴趣与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普达成互惠互利的贸易协议，并准备讨论降低或取消汽车和其他商品关税的可能性。【原文：The European Union's top trade officials said on Wednesday the bloc was interested in making mutually beneficial trade deals with U.S. President Donald Trump, and was ready to discuss the potential for reducing or eliminating tariffs on motor vehicles and other goods.】

item.title: 中国 ETF 因人工智能游戏和关税担忧缓解而吸引看涨期权押注
item.description: 人工智能初创公司 DeepSeek 的出现使中国科技股的前景更加光明，与关税相关的消息似乎也没有以前那么具有威胁性，因此专注于中国的美国上市交易所交易基金吸引了看涨期权流。【原文：U.S.-listed exchange-traded funds focused on China have drawn bullish options flows as the emergence of artificial intelligence startup DeepSeek brightens the outlook for Chinese tech shares, and tariff-related news seemed less threatening than before.】

item.title: 会议纪要显示，特朗普政策的潜在影响引发美联储对通胀的担忧
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的初步政策建议激起了美联储对通胀走高的担忧，决策者们在特朗普1月20日就职约一周后举行的一次会议上表示，企业告诉美国央行，它们普遍预计将提高价格以转嫁进口关税成本。【原文：President Donald Trump's initial policy proposals stoked concern at the Federal Reserve about higher inflation, with firms telling the U.S. central bank they generally expected to raise prices to pass through the cost of import tariffs, policymakers said at a meeting held about a week after Trump's January 20 inauguration.】

item.title: 独家报道巴里克黄金公司与马里签署协议结束采矿争端
item.description: 两位熟悉事态发展的人士周三告诉路透社，加拿大矿商巴里克黄金公司（Barrick Gold）已与马里政府签署了一项新协议，以结束双方就其在西非国家的采矿资产长达近两年的争议。【原文：Canadian miner Barrick Gold has signed a new agreement with the Malian government to end an almost two-year-old dispute over its mining assets in the West African country, two people familiar with the developments told Reuters on Wednesday.】

item.title: 解说：西方公司会重返俄罗斯吗？
item.description: 在莫斯科和华盛顿讨论如何结束乌克兰战争之际，投资者心中的众多疑问之一是，为反对俄罗斯于 2022 年 2 月入侵邻国，企业纷纷撤离俄罗斯的趋势是否会逆转。【原文：As Moscow and Washington discuss how to end the war in Ukraine, one of the many questions on investors' minds is whether the corporate exodus from Russia in opposition to the February 2022 invasion of its neighbour may be reversed.】

item.title: 力拓报告全年利润为五年来最小
item.description: 力拓周三公布的全年基本盈利为五年来最小，原因是铁矿石价格下跌超过了铜和铝业务的增长。【原文：Rio Tinto reported its smallest full-year underlying earnings in five years on Wednesday as lower prices for iron ore outweighed growth in its copper and aluminium businesses.】

item.title: 据 CNBC 报道，联合健康保险公司（UnitedHealthcare）向部分员工提供收购方案，并可能进行裁员
item.description: 据 CNBC 周三报道，联合健康（UnitedHealth）保险部门正在为其福利运营部门的员工提供选择，如果他们在 3 月 3 日前辞职，可以接受买断。【原文：UnitedHealth's insurance unit is offering employees in its benefits operations unit the option to accept buyouts if they quit by March 3, CNBC reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 谷歌培养人工智能联合科学家，为研究人员提供帮助
item.description: 美国蓝筹股谷歌公司周三表示，该公司已开发出一种人工智能工具，可充当生物医学家的虚拟合作者。【原文：Google has developed an AI tool to act as a virtual collaborator for biomedical scientists, the U.S. blue chip said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 摩根大通认为乌克兰和平协议将适度提振货币
item.description: 投资银行摩根大通（JPMorgan）周三表示，结束乌克兰与俄罗斯之间战争的停火或和平协议将对附近新兴经济体的货币产生 "净积极影响"。【原文：A ceasefire or peace deal to end the war between Ukraine and Russia would be "net positive" for the currencies of nearby emerging economies, investment bank JPMorgan said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 埃克森公司计划在以石油为主的圭亚那实施大型天然气项目
item.description: 美国石油巨头埃克森美孚公司计划通过周三宣布的一个大型项目增加圭亚那的天然气产量和供应量。【原文：U.S. oil major Exxon Mobil is planning to increase natural gas output and supply in Guyana through a large-scale project announced on Wednesday, following the government's call for more gas to fuel onshore power and petrochemical projects.】

item.title: 西门子有望通过出售西门子医疗集团股份筹集约 12 亿欧元资金
item.description: 德国工程公司西门子周三表示，将出售医疗保健子公司西门子医疗集团（Siemens Healthineers）2%的股份，筹集约12亿欧元（约合12.5亿美元）资金，用于支付收购美国软件公司Altair Engineering的费用。【原文：German engineering company Siemens is selling a 2% stake in healthcare subsidiary Siemens Healthineers , it said on Wednesday, raising roughly 1.2 billion euros ($1.25 billion) that could help pay for its acquisition of U.S. software firm Altair Engineering.】

item.title: 国泰君安将最大 ETF 的头衔让给 Vanguard
item.description: 根据FactSet的数据，先锋集团（Vanguard Group）的标准普尔500指数ETF周二超过竞争对手道富环球顾问公司（State Street Global Advisors）的SPDR S&P 500信托基金，成为全球最大的交易所交易基金。【原文：Vanguard Group's Standard & Poor's 500 ETF overtook rival State Street Global Advisors' SPDR S&P 500 Trust , on Tuesday to become the world's largest exchange-traded fund, according to data from FactSet.】

item.title: 阿克曼表示，他对霍华德-休斯公司的计划不会影响其投资组合的投资方式
item.description: 亿万富翁投资者比尔-阿克曼（Bill Ackman）计划将房地产公司霍华德-休斯控股公司（Howard Hughes Holdings）转变为一家多元化控股公司，但这不会影响其投资组合买卖公司股权的方式。【原文：Billionaire investor Bill Ackman's plans to turn real estate company Howard Hughes Holdings into a diversified holding company will not impact how his investment portfolios buy and sell stakes in companies.】

item.title: 前英特尔高管为 RISC-V 芯片初创公司融资 2150 万美元
item.description: 新成立的芯片初创公司 AheadComputing 周三表示，它已筹集到 2150 万美元的种子资金。【原文：Newly formed chip startup AheadComputing on Wednesday said it had raised $21.5 million in seed funding.】

item.title: 部长称意大利正在研究马斯克 "星链 "的替代方案
item.description: 意大利工业部长周三表示，意大利正致力于为政府通信开发自己的低轨道卫星，作为美国亿万富翁埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）所提供系统的替代方案。【原文：Italy is aiming to develop its own low-orbit satellites for government communications, its industry minister said on Wednesday, presenting it as an alternative to systems provided by U.S. billionaire Elon Musk.】
